quotes.quote: Happy Monday! Whatever you do today, do it to the best of your abilities. You can do this.
Mindset is everything. Carry your weekend vibe into Monday morning.
Focus more, smile more, grind more. Show Monday who's the boss!
Say hello to Monday and to a brand new week filled with endless possibilities.
The mood you're in sets your tone for the day. Enjoy a good mood and a great day today!
Monday is made for crushing goals.
Monday Note: you are here to blaze a trail of happiness.
Wake up on Monday and start your day with a lot of awesomeness and you will get happiness back.
quotes.author: Jim Butcher

quotes.quote: You deserve to smile, to be happy, and to experience a beautiful Monday.
Happy Monday! Have a cup of coffee and let's do this. Your attitude determines your altitude.
Mondays are for fresh starts.
Whatever your wildest dream is, go after that this week.
Happy Monday; don't forget to be awesome today!
Every morning you have two choices: continue to sleep with your dreams, or wake up and chase them.
This Monday, shine so brightly that your haters have to shield their eyes.
Here's hoping that something unexpectedly wonderful happens to you this week.
From sunlight to moonlight and everything in between, wishing you a Monday that makes your heart happy.
Monday gives you a fresh start, every time.
Well, hello there Monday! I wasn't expecting to see you so soon.
Monday is a fresh start. It's never too late to dig in and begin a new journey of success.
When you build a life you truly love, Monday will be just as beautiful as Saturday.
Either you run the day or the day runs you. Have a great Monday.
Monday is a state of mind. Tell yourself you're going to have a great day and you will.
Put down any burdens left from last week, and start your Monday worry-free.
Fresh Monday. Fresh Start. Fresh Goals. Fresh Dreams.
New Monday. New week. New mindset.
I believe awesome things will happen. because it's Monday.
quotes.author: John Adams

quotes.quote: Live your best life every day of the week - even Monday.
One small step forward on a Monday can make your whole week better.
Yes, it's Monday - but you can still bring your Saturday attitude! Enjoy your Monday.
